data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Portuguesa, Venezuela.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Portuguesa, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Portuguesa, Venezuela and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 106,191 believers in the state of Portuguesa.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Portuguesa, Venezuela a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Spanish-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Portuguesa, Venezuela from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 873,400 people living in Portuguesa, Venezuela. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Portuguesa, Venezuela has a population of 873,400.

We estimate Portuguesa has 106,191 people who might know Jesus, 615,302 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 151,906 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Portuguesa, Venezuela so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Portuguesa
location.cities_list: Guanare, Acarigua, Araure, Villa Bruzual, Píritu
location.cities_list_w_pop: Guanare (194,688), Acarigua (188,278), Araure (181,820), Villa Bruzual (55,244), Píritu (43,746)
